scripts.build-creator: terser -c -m -o build/creator/js/chunk-vendors.ae283b72.js -- js/chunk-vendors.ae283b72.js && terser -c -m -o build/creator/js/chunk-2d0e6102.09695d49.js -- js/chunk-2d0e6102.09695d49.js && terser -c -m -o build/creator/js/app.d3103a3b.js -- js/app.d3103a3b.js && copyfiles css/* build/creator/ && copyfiles favicon.ico build/creator/ && copyfiles index.html build/creator/ && copyfiles LICENSE.txt build/creator/ && copyfiles js/html-to-image.min.js build/creator/
